attributes.action: re-open old railway networks that still exist around the country using them as tram/train networks plus cycle paths thus reducing traffic conjestion around the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
by re-opening the old railway infrastructure (that was the envy of the world 100 years ago)that still largely exists and by also reducing the cost of public transport its self. freight and the public could once again be transported by train/trams,
vastly reducing CO2 emmissions.
By also adding cycle paths along the sides of these tracks it may have possible health benefits to a portion of the population reducing NHS costs.
we need to entice people/cargo off the roads not punish them for being on them.
